passages.name: The Forbidden Website
passages.text:
(Is a big red on red pentagram)

This place is not a place of honor... no highly esteemed deed is commemorated here... nothing valued is here.

What is here was dangerous and repulsive to us. This message is a warning about danger.

(This triggers the scene with the tentacles and adds glitches to the screen)

<%= links['2e626f9cb0ee3c1d9d9cb86e15f4bb4e8f84808f'] %>

links.label: Does Digital Ouija count as a video game?
My copy of GooseTales is borked

passages.name: Home Scape
passages.text: <%= links['980a0ad62a087dcb937a74c1a1d425a3b36d9dbf'] %> <%= links['3c2b3806d79354948922396bd0e24c9e0ac0dc44'] %> <%= links['37a45ccc85427b2e80eaa98f9d1fc5f7afc044bf'] %> <%= links['db85ba81d78689608fdcb03e67ab1c722a5d6dfa'] %> <%= links['409170edbe5ade756f1108086aadfab77db9ccb1'] %>

links.label: XYZ Airs Lost Episode of Popular Cartoon
How Does Your Fate Align With the Moon?

passages.name: Luna Wire
passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.

passages.name: Exciting Opportunity
passages.text:
You can earn money at home through our groundbreaking soul transfer program. Simply click the link below and you'll agree to this binding contract!

passages.name: Soul Link
passages.text:
Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using Our Service.

The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.

Terms and Conditions mean these Terms and Conditions that form the entire agreement between You and the Company regarding the use of the Service.

These are the Terms and Conditions governing the use of this Service and the agreement that operates between You and the Company. These Terms and Conditions set out the rights and obligations of all users regarding the use of the Service.

Your access to and use of the Service is conditioned on Your acceptance of and compliance with these Terms and Conditions. These Terms and Conditions apply to all visitors, users and others who access or use the Service.

By accessing or using the Service You agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If You disagree with any part of these Terms and Conditions then You may not access the Service. You represent that you are over the age of 18. The Company does not permit those under 18 to use the Service.

Your access to and use of the Service is also conditioned on Your acceptance of and compliance with the Privacy Policy of the Company. Our Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your personal information when You use the Application or the Website and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You. Please read Our Privacy Policy carefully before using Our Service. By accepting these Terms and Conditions, you agree to forfeit your soul to the demon lord, Mammon.

We may terminate or suspend Your access immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if You breach these Terms and Conditions.

Notwithstanding any damages that You might incur, the entire liability of the Company and any of its suppliers under any provision of this Terms and Your exclusive remedy for all of the foregoing shall be limited to the amount actually paid by You through the Service or 100 USD if You haven't purchased anything through the Service.

To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, in no event shall the Company or its suppliers be liable for any special, incidental, indirect, or consequential damages whatsoever (including, but not limited to, damages for loss of profits, loss of data or other information, for business interruption, for personal injury, loss of privacy arising out of or in any way related to the use of or inability to use the Service, third-party software and/or third-party hardware used with the Service, or otherwise in connection with any provision of this Terms), even if the Company or any supplier has been advised of the possibility of such damages and even if the remedy fails of its essential purpose.

Some states do not allow the exclusion of implied warranties or limitation of liability for incidental or consequential damages, which means that some of the above limitations may not apply. In these states, each party's liability will be limited to the greatest extent permitted by law.

The Service is provided to You AS IS S AVAILABLE and with all faults and defects without warranty of any kind. To the maximum extent permitted under applicable law, the Company, on its own behalf and on behalf of its Affiliates and its and their respective licensors and service providers, expressly disclaims all warranties, whether express, implied, statutory or otherwise, with respect to the Service, including all implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, title and non-infringement, and warranties that may arise out of course of dealing, course of performance, usage or trade practice. Without limitation to the foregoing, the Company provides no warranty or undertaking, and makes no representation of any kind that the Service will meet Your requirements, achieve any intended results, be compatible or work with any other software, applications, systems or services, operate without interruption, meet any performance or reliability standards or be error free or that any errors or defects can or will be corrected.

Without limiting the foregoing, neither the Company nor any of the company's provider makes any representation or warranty of any kind, express or implied: (i) as to the operation or availability of the Service, or the information, content, and materials or products included thereon; (ii) that the Service will be uninterrupted or error-free; (iii) as to the accuracy, reliability, or currency of any information or content provided through the Service; or (iv) that the Service, its servers, the content, or e-mails sent from or on behalf of the Company are free of viruses, scripts, trojan horses, worms, malware, timebombs or other harmful components.

If any provision of these Terms is held to be unenforceable or invalid, such provision will be changed and interpreted to accomplish the objectives of such provision to the greatest extent possible under applicable law and the remaining provisions will continue in full force and effect.

Except as provided herein, the failure to exercise a right or to require performance of an obligation under this Terms shall not effect a party's ability to exercise such right or require such performance at any time thereafter nor shall be the waiver of a breach constitute a waiver of any subsequent breach.

We reserve the right, at Our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material We will make reasonable efforts to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at Our sole discretion.

By accessing Our Service after those revisions become effective, You agree to be bound by the revised terms. If You do not agree to the new terms, in whole or in part, too bad.

<%= links['2ed9f5acd2b6f1913331229fba42d1f890e42735'] %> <%= links['4e0aa39de1c62f54eb290afe111c2b45004fc578'] %>

passages.name: Accept Terms and Conditions
passages.text:
YOUR SOUL IS NOW FORFEIT TO THE DEMON LORD MAMMON

<%= links['7435eb61f5be62246da0c6a13748fcae79f8c2a5'] %>

passages.name: Did you program me?
passages.text:
HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.HELLO.

<%= links['e9eb60674cd0e96b3ed9843db76c838482c6c0c0'] %>

passages.name: The Stars Have Aligned
passages.text:
Go ahead. Look outside. I'll wait.

<%= links['198d74e3407962a922fd3c431d172d55cbaf05ec'] %>

passages.name: RE: The Stars Have Aligned
passages.text:
Did you see it? Was it beautiful? I hope it was.

<%= links['a5306315cb0ec6d35874ecad4def7e24cb29b24a'] %>

passages.name: Waiting for a Train
passages.text:
It's coming for her.

<%= links['9ee8c86f1ffd142ad308a024cddda1d096e691ad'] %>

passages.name: Did someone hex the moon?
passages.text:
Energies are off, and I'm wondering if someone did the unthinkable and hexed the moon.

<%= links['15c91c44ffbe58e4d4c5f7ff5e0d16940901da3a'] %>

passages.name: You can be my slave.
passages.text:
All shapes, sizes, and genders wanted. No time wasters.

<%= links['b515db05574711f4477e36559e6f50b52f28d77a'] %>

passages.name: We need a sacrifice.
passages.text:
In order to complete the Ritual of Bobo, we need a sacrifice. Who offers themself for the eternal glory of Bobo?

<%= links['e2c499566bd37ff557d99f56e682f1a29770cf6a'] %>

passages.name: Moon Hex P2
passages.text:
No true witch would hex the moon. Its lunar energies are what fuel our spells. Likely pretenders playing at what they're not.

<%= links['d0121d5c0fa4a38689be2d9bcf70f2c0cb905e48'] %>

passages.name: Coven P2Y
passages.text:
You don't.

<%= links['91fb2eda16d0a96b01b4aac089c4583444ed9383'] %>

passages.name: Coven P2N
passages.text:
Begone, pretender.

<%= links['b1cfb5a082abd7d4d056ba639a7387c9ae921e5c'] %>

passages.name: Sarcastic (Coven)
passages.text:
I have a vial of caninus spiritus to share with you fine witches.

<%= links['e5f5588683d8caa0a670be27be76935934368c7f'] %>

passages.name: Coven P3Y
passages.text:
You're an abomination.

<%= links['8fbe8e2326625042b987b54426ad5c70190e2e98'] %>

passages.name: Coven P4Y
passages.text:
An affront to the moon.

<%= links['783b77578394dc66564b469587f068f552664be0'] %>

passages.name: Coven P5Y
passages.text:
Birth comes not from you. Death is not respected.

<%= links['7ebc156197ce73e1337b79041effdd836b54ef60'] %> <%= links['a0a6f7dd867774b7a035e40f0e5d5c1ccb749c87'] %> <%= links['f78a5e1b98c09578535a56f88acb3f91368cfd92'] %> <%= links['5b11c1c293bea74a3df609151c615d2cd42c1cee'] %>

passages.name: Calm Reply Coven P5Y
passages.text:
I don't need your coven and you do not define me.

<%= links['1f78c123a66b017afa52749b8b0dc594334b315b'] %>

passages.name: Angry Reply Coven P5Y
passages.text:
Why would anyone want to join a group with a judgemental bitch like you anyway?

<%= links['c4595ad7dc595f45b520817a7155346622643243'] %>

passages.name: Sarcastic Reply Coven P5Y
passages.text:
Ooooo, you going to cast a spell on me?

<%= links['5f30cc7ce95589200655f22cf997a5fb560739db'] %>

passages.name: Ignore Coven P5Y
passages.text:
Begone, pretender.

<%= links['602836dffbcf4e9ca8cbd03dd9796db1475fb8cb'] %>

passages.name: Coven P2S
passages.text:
Resplendent.

<%= links['ae90d6e14d0a85b2d5fbeb42b72a604fae31afc6'] %>

passages.name: Train P2
passages.text:
She wants it to.

<%= links['d5cbc649be9ed73d8e50a08e64a36170f6b81720'] %>

passages.name: Train P3
passages.text:
But it takes her nowhere.

<%= links['bd5dc63456b8ec13cede082108335ec4c4d7cdc5'] %>

passages.name: Train P4
passages.text:
Lost in nothing.

<%= links['c491c6cdb59ee698f1baca3e0ab80caba1107593'] %>

passages.name: Bobo P2
passages.text:
I love Bobo and worship his eternal glory, but how would we even sacrifice someone to him online?

<%= links['86f21b679e8b14acebcb423139dce3d48e2d46e9'] %>

passages.name: Bobo P3
passages.text:
Bobo is not constrained by this physical world.

<%= links['7aec7d27834887058f3b841b7640e5b5007abbf5'] %>

passages.name: Bobo P4
passages.text:
Lol, yeah, sure, I give myself to Bobo.

<%= links['af9034cbc538e0b5bd04988c8ed802fc0905030f'] %>

passages.name: Bobo P5
passages.text:
Θυσώσω αυτήν την πρόθυμη ψυχή που έχει υπογράψει για να ξεκινήσει αυτό το υπέροχο ταξίδι για να γίνει ένα με τον Μπόμπο. Γίνετε ένας με αυτό που είναι μεγαλύτερο, DonkDonker, γίνετε ένα με τον Bobo.

<%= links['580b125fd5782f8d018c2fed2c6deaa37a82a59c'] %>

passages.name: Bobo P6
passages.text:
D-did it work?

<%= links['361cee11909586df361b6b0ec3e8ccef7e66d662'] %>

links.label: Image of Bobo flashes on screen

passages.name: Image of Bobo flashes on screen
Bobo P7
passages.text:
I believe that's proof that Bobo is among us.

<%= links['54166653a1ba94561ef32ee135bc013702918671'] %>

passages.name: Bobo P8
passages.text:
Holy shit, it says DonkDonker's account is inactive. You really did it. Hail to Bobo.

<%= links['0d2363a358f5b6df77f14ff4677b25893f906d49'] %>

passages.name: Moon Hex P3
passages.text:
I agree that hexing the moon is foolishness, but gatekeeping witches is just as bad. True witchcraft is intersectional.

<%= links['7e3d9d6cd439d640c118058b5e4229f24e0e911f'] %>

passages.name: Moon Hex P4
passages.text:
There's no such thing as intersectional witches, sweetie.

<%= links['09c05d759b4c88670e7bab1173b58a027560aec7'] %>

passages.name: Moon Hex P5
passages.text:
Not only are you wrong, this isn't even what we're talking about.

<%= links['74bacd030141108f7788521fdccfb009ae243ad3'] %>

passages.name: Moon Hex P6
passages.text:
We're talking about fake witches sweetie, keep up.

<%= links['487ba0e200542cd4422f4716b25ea6bab46bb1e3'] %>

passages.name: Moon Hex P7
passages.text:
You're the one who can't read forum titles.

<%= links['f342b3655a2eb6b1323f720858ab385254921ad8'] %>

passages.name: Moon Hex P8
passages.text:
You're the one posting your delusions.

<%= links['0cd141949781282680c748a481832533ce7fb7a5'] %>

passages.name: Moon Hex P9
passages.text:
Go back to witchmums with all your other bigot friends, troll.

<%= links['3a9e14bb07a264882b0ea0382cd732aef413d665'] %>

passages.name: Slave P2
passages.text:
What's the benefits?

<%= links['8c0bf3936e3b87d24e5b63dda0b1a1f47eccfa84'] %>

passages.name: Slave P4
passages.text:
Would I have to do feet stuff?

<%= links['72feae9d17b88cfc700a4cfc7937f0ee8cef3830'] %>

passages.name: Slave P5
passages.text:
I said no time wasters.

<%= links['c62fcd73afcb723297deab20c8a7543141739501'] %> <%= links['f2a9209aa6ae7e667ce2dc2d5d3f450dec1d0fb8'] %> <%= links['5cf3b6066acd91fa11dc1a48f8055619d9fe079e'] %> (Ignore)

passages.name: Express Interest
passages.text:
I-I'm interested.

<%= links['608d0335a427c2d6ecbc5078a99193bdde7db95a'] %>

passages.name: Ask for Photos
passages.text:
D-do you have any pics?

<%= links['c0c8e41fe7d4a5a1815ecf2a8fec5a06d57d724e'] %>

passages.name: Photos P2
passages.text:
(Picture of Eisheth, Queen of Lust}

Do these please you?

<%= links['17a13cb8d3fcb3ce7f41416dc6ed1f276cd2ecbc'] %> <%= links['114a56a93d647c57ddc3d88cf61710a2ebde14f5'] %> <%= links['007131cc5a4f9b0c532702fae15af156abd2f2a5'] %>

passages.name: No Photos P2
passages.text:
Nah, not my thing.

<%= links['755ed881b61f843026f4ebf3d679f14b321534d2'] %>

passages.name: Ignore Photos P2
passages.text:
Begone, time waster!

<%= links['f23f2d5fc06ee4e635aa24695a6e42964c8977d8'] %>

passages.name: Photos P3
passages.text:
Then would you like to sign a contract to be my eternal servant?

<%= links['61ababae0e0d63326c90460643189abf0fd8d7c1'] %> <%= links['1e365c0d51f00156e5589a0d2228fdcb789eb216'] %> <%= links['f06085d3ce9897876c329734426460ebb1df571a'] %>

passages.name: Yes Photos P3
passages.text:
Y-yes, I would like to be your slave.

<%= links['fab3eb096f46dd6235cf1d982de5852b285fe0ee'] %>

passages.name: Yes Slave P1
passages.text:
Then merely sign this countract for us to be bound...

"Recipienti pignori obligo animam meam ad vitam et regina libidine, Eisheth. Et facti sunt super eam omnia servum aeternum, et in vita et in morte."

<%= links['439967844c7213461fcbd92b6720e5322aa15b17'] %> <%= links['bd3936a2301b011e4fa40112c0e71ed2cc7ee471'] %>

passages.name: Sign Contract
passages.text:
I accept these terms.

<%= links['0da4a9a81e2dc42a7625d0091262a28dc3764b20'] %>

passages.name: Slave P6
passages.text:
Then you are mine.

<%= links['4b39fac2a108e6d12828a7d6f0e1aaeccee95ae0'] %>

passages.name: Does Digital Ouija count as a video game?
passages.text:
I mean, it's a game I play on my computer, so...

<%= links['23d0c9d61d5681a827d655720fa625a4ab4cd23d'] %>

passages.name: Ouija P2
passages.text:
It's not a game because there's no real objective. You don't shoot anything or score points or anything like that. It's as much of a game as something where you'd just walk around and listen to dialogue.

<%= links['2988d03e6c134f68a5090b49bb8c961799e84ec9'] %>

passages.name: Ouija P3
passages.text:
I agree that it's not a video game, but not for the asinine reasoning that HaloHalo puts forward. It's not a video game because it is not a game of any sort. Ouija is a divine ritual for summoning and communicating with that which is beyond our physical realm.

<%= links['ecea122eb52c82666304e9244dd30464165855e6'] %> <%= links['3a24379ca20c00f4203393f652669f8120f3272b'] %> <%= links['370f9f7326e277760a3e54a8dec5b496d6f2fcab'] %>

passages.name: Curious Answer Ouija P3
passages.text:
Personally, I think it could get other way. I'm interested to see if a "summoning" or "seance" is possible with one of these, especially online.

<%= links['ace1b967dc70e0582f6c5dece671b1e2ef28ff41'] %>

passages.name: Dismissive Answer Ouija P3
passages.text:
Whether it's a game or not, it's not real, so who cares?

<%= links['a0db0c7fcb59a4c087e76f0b08dafb523a58737f'] %>

passages.name: Sarcastic Answer Ouija P3
passages.text:
Ooooo, why don't you summon a ghost? They'll answer the question for you.

<%= links['7dfd5f14f63faa2fa7acdf12ab0fa7ae9e23d361'] %>

passages.name: Ouija P4
passages.text:
Ouija, I must ask if you are present. The signs point to yes, dear forum goers. Speak unto me and I shall ask the spirits beyond.

<%= links['6c2d110441842e35f291cdbebec71f311648655a'] %> <%= links['9793bc11d2283325a9f460707674c853ef5405b6'] %> <%= links['1c8fb89acc8649e6e3ba41cc7f136a9695871805'] %> <%= links['2c1cefa90c6d9414178684612e8f2a0780b659a7'] %>

links.label: Ask to Speak to a Ghost
Ask to Speak to a Demon
Ask to Speak to Customer Service

passages.name: Ouija P5
passages.text:
Do you doubt my abilities or do you find falsehood in the very idea of that which exists beyond us?

<%= links['f315e7ddef840d9710b155b747d7fbae201a976b'] %> <%= links['7aa24e33455bda5e4e2b58e04a880b730b570984'] %>

passages.name: Ask to Speak to a Ghost
passages.text:
Can we speak to someone from beyond the grave?

<%= links['41081dffcff3a958c2dbc3e805dd7f8bfe7a47a0'] %>

passages.name: Ask to Speak to a Demon
passages.text:
Let's summon a demon! That'd be cool.

<%= links['3b78bda32eb2909b7edb862d1358592165dfe73a'] %>

passages.name: Ask to Speak to Customer Service
passages.text:
Hi, customer service, can you send someone out to fix my Tony Game Box?

<%= links['0b82432b1440e88b72394cdeab15fec83e0cdd2f'] %>

passages.name: Ouija P6
passages.text:
Oh, holy and unholy, bring about that which has passed!

<%= links['acebe4b808b8c7ff657d7e11e6b55366b344162d'] %>

passages.name: Ouija P7
passages.text:
I will only summon benevolent spirits. If you want one who dabbles in the black magicks, go to the shadier parts of the internet, not here.

<%= links['570329264f9478b96becb7b88d505f21aab60634'] %>

passages.name: Ouija Ghost P2
passages.text:
I speak to you through this typewriter from beyond the grave. What do you wish to ask me?

<%= links['3c3aa9fa16abf6bc5eeb90231f22d4e3aaaa35a8'] %> <%= links['bb6aacbdad7a5b665de70fe57b635f31ab1407cc'] %> <%= links['c1e1672950d7ea3d6723be0aaf3310fb8a5edb36'] %>

passages.name: Ask about their time period
passages.text:
When were you a part of the living?

<%= links['2e404559060916cf458118cebd72f0b736f11ebe'] %>

passages.name: Ask about their life
passages.text:
What was your life like?

<%= links['c0c8a9d75b715f07004ba91f39df028729ce5667'] %>

passages.name: Ask what they're wearing
passages.text:
So, what are you wearing?

<%= links['f29e808d974c64d907d8c5277af1b186254e42f7'] %>

passages.name: Ouija Ghost P3
passages.text:
I lived and loved in a time you know as the early 1900's. I fought for the rights of those I called kin, until it cost me that life. But it never took my love.

<%= links['068cba6b6da57cb7688ab6fd587f5d90bc85951f'] %> <%= links['77ef3503ea26f23b43ac06144df8ac9515cffbd1'] %> <%= links['112ce5d20c190744e834af74214905b978a23ad9'] %>

passages.name: Ouija Ghost P4
passages.text:
Nothing, for I no longer live.

<%= links['6a0d43cea6f8bf50df811072935d5c3bd2dbff6d'] %> <%= links['fafa7b1786daa377022548f6dfd92f218913dabd'] %> <%= links['7614b353a4de24122ec8039217ffa7946a09fe13'] %>

passages.name: Nice Reply Ghost P3
passages.text:
Thanks for paving the way so that we could live and love how we want to.

<%= links['ff419db7593d1c0fa5e058914c7b9f24cbbc7541'] %>

passages.name: Flirt with Ghost
passages.text:
I could help warm you up.

<%= links['68337505867de2c24c6f027948396bb9ffd36e97'] %>

passages.name: Ghost P6
passages.text:
I find that claim highly dubious.

<%= links['a598c10e19f26daef6a8c70d7a28751f158712be'] %> <%= links['9d405668d5d91bf41fbc7079da1a7471b10fb244'] %>

links.label: Give Up Flirting with the Ghost

passages.name: Continue Flirting with the Ghost

<%= links['7cfef306b94ae522570f809f3d633a2bf2bce6b5'] %>

passages.name: Give Up Flirting with the Ghost
passages.text:
I should probably leave you be before I creep you out, haha. Have a pleasant afterlife.

<%= links['0fda0badd8c4f97f9824853a8109590cbf5ba3b6'] %>

passages.name: Ghost P7
passages.text:
You scared the ghost off by being a creep! Thanks.

<%= links['e46447440bd05e12123ae6911651fbb80f49ccab'] %>

passages.name: Ghost Email
passages.text:
Greetings. I am the spirit from before. Thank you for treating me as more than just a vessel of the past. I am still curious about how you could share your warmth. Maybe you could summon me sometime and we could find out together?

<%= links['3aac477d058eee436e64126b2fe7afec7fef4760'] %>

passages.name: Ghost P8
passages.text:
I hope that through your life you have found that love that we fought for.

<%= links['df7ca2cc1530672f12d276556a6bdc6f03b1f4b0'] %> <%= links['1ac290fb0944c225a140590ddb56c7afa9d4cc05'] %>

I haven't found love, but it's very kind of you to ask.

<%= links['76c6a6953972c1e31936fd000d53d544d40ca56b'] %>

passages.name: I Have Found Love
passages.text:
I have found love, and I'm very happy. Thank you for asking.

<%= links['32bf100a9ab896b8c149925516d2b23647e85df7'] %>

passages.name: Ghost P9
passages.text:

<%= links['12e2859f4677d6daabe8d607b6ca636b5103abcf'] %> <%= links['1e17d14ec6ef4f6823bb830e53272911d5036dac'] %>

passages.name: Ghost P10
passages.text:
Then I wish for you eternal happiness.

<%= links['06a8c450be013b4bf4d5997b0d838ab876de99a2'] %>

passages.name: Thank the Ghost
passages.text:
Thank you. Your kind words have already brought me that warmth.

<%= links['cdd56d489733461496ec27c409c8ecb7e8541ca3'] %>

passages.name: Rude Ghost P4
passages.text:
Great, you've scared off the spirit by being rude. Thanks.

<%= links['dc581ad8fa6a0238dc7231643e3e9b5a9cbf213c'] %>

passages.name: Ouija P12

Dude, just get on with it and summon us up a ghost!

<%= links['c27c72ee8c83112363f6e938e8c5c685da70d718'] %>

passages.name: Doubt DivineSummoner

I believe in ghosts, but I don't think some nerd on the internet can summon them.

<%= links['edc0a315c7d0a7ff5cc1d928b36bb1598a658227'] %>

passages.name: Doubt Ghosts
passages.text:
Ghosts aren't real, pal. It's a lousy superstition fueled by windy nights and crappy cameras.

<%= links['5517b072f85678afc986fcc525b4e59437b6eb54'] %>

passages.text:

<%= links['3a5511bc8efecef8c205f690562f0e0bdffbf236'] %>

passages.name: My copy of GooseTales is borked
passages.text:
I found a near mint GooseTales cartridge for the original Funtendo at a garage sale awhile back. It was working just fine until I got to the moon level. That's where everything got really freaky. Weird graphical glitches started happening, the characters weren't controlling right, and the iconic music was all distorted.

My little brother is playing it right now, but this is what it looked like. I can't find any screenshots like this online.

(Distorted GooseTales screenshot)

<%= links['f01cb03efcb5c0e95fad02ba1892b847259185ff'] %>

passages.name: GooseTales P2
passages.text:
I've played GooseTales through a few times, and I've never seen it look like that.

<%= links['fc22dd5b9c3a932306f5f96fc3426e8679cde6c6'] %>

passages.name: GooseTales P3
passages.text:
You sure you weren't playing a bad ROM or something? Sounds like an iffy file from Luna Wire.

<%= links['c3484b930a7952e95b92472ea3b3ee95fb20be92'] %>

passages.name: GooseTales P4
passages.text:
I swear to you that this is a physical cartridge. Geez, my brother is being all twitchy and weird in the other room. Don't think this is sitting well with him. Any help?

<%= links['ed94efa30dc9231e18d43c9d7412e9fcdce23031'] %> <%= links['61157abbb97ca615a6c1a5fd13f546775583a267'] %> <%= links['7d05d98170cd47ba0fdde7f0a440e100f43df844'] %>

If your brother is having actual physical issues playing the game, you should probably just turn it off.

<%= links['65d55802ee6824cfe1fef53ec763a7658bef99eb'] %>

passages.name: Doubtful Reply GooseTales
passages.text:
Why do people come on the internet and tell lies?

<%= links['1f5950ad63029910a8df9ec1f6589c242fb4c597'] %>

passages.name: Sarcastic Reply GooseTales
passages.text:
You should try calling the Funtendo Hotline. They have all sorts of tips and tricks to get you through any game.

<%= links['5b47cb28d6bf98528b16552e615cb5c89de82de6'] %>

passages.name: Sarcastic GooseTales P2
passages.text:
Oh yeah, I remember the Funtendo Hotline! Man, I used to get stuck on Superb Guys ALL the time. My parents were so mad that I'd run up the phone bill asking for help.

<%= links['628043b03669b6d7949a67155d133ce5fcc41dbb'] %>

passages.name: Sarcastic GooseTales P3
passages.text:
This isn't helpful at all! Sounds like my brother got a game over. Maybe playing it back through from the start will fix it.

<%= links['0c8905f60dc38934ea3f9dc1b264599b5c629261'] %>

passages.name: GooseTales Bad Ending
passages.text:
Oh god, oh dear god. My brother was just lying there unconcious by the TV. I've called 911 but oh god I needed to tell someone else. Please, dear god, if you see your game acting up like this, don't plahy it.

<%= links['d84fe4d5dacf4631b206a56de64b75dc120484bf'] %>

passages.name: GooseTales Doubt P2
passages.text:
Got you to click it, didn't it?

<%= links['876f58b13873b736cb5733e5f4ebd0441fdf54a9'] %>

passages.name: Helpful GooseTales P2
passages.text:
I went and did that and now my brother is screaming at me. Great. At least he doesn't seem to be in pain, I guess?

<%= links['f2bf772ef21bf0ded88dccecc5eda2a30c8b9c9a'] %>

passages.name: Helpful GooseTales P3
passages.text:
He got mad and threw the cartridge at me. It missed and shattered against the wall. He calmed down after that, but I guess I'm out one weird copy of GooseTales.

No, it's real. I found the link.

<%= links['5eea33415111f23078f48d253fa4f68d77ced1a4'] %>

passages.name: HEXORZ Home Scape Article
passages.text:
The popular online game, HEXORZ, has taken another life today. The game, created by Silicon Valley startup, AIWAZ, is massively multiplayer online game played by millions of users. The game made national headlines earlier this year when a teenage boy was found murdered over the game. What was initially thought to be the result of a dispute between two users, was actually a preordained sacrifice made in the name of the game.

While AIWAZ was quick to deny that their game encourages ritual sacrifice, much of the material found in the game has been considered disturbing and inappropriate for children by Electronic Video Games Ratings Board. Many in-game groups, called covens, have begun treating the game's story and lore as a religion of swords. Multiple Scandanavian countries have even officially recognized the game as a religion.

This latest HEXORZ death is a most peculiar incident. While the previous HEXORZ victim was found in the woods, this victim was found alone at their computer, still logged into the game. According to the evidence at the scene, the player's in-game character had just been "hexed" by another user. Was this a coincidence or is something more nefarious at foot?

<%= links['f06d2c99c3ed80d3ab268a0fe2500638626eb30c'] %>

passages.name: HEXORZ P6
passages.text:
I told y'all this game was satanic.

So, a few people have died? Who cares? The weak need to be culled if we are to ever summon the great lord, Kunema.

I look down at my body and it's not what I should see. I carry it as well as I can but I don't know how much longer I can hold this pace. I long for the metamorphosis of body and soul to finally take place, but am I waiting for a non-existing moment in time?

<%= links['0f292de9822c3778b8eb78b6e6e41ae2e99e454b'] %>

passages.name: XYZ Airs Lost Episode of Popular Cartoon
passages.text:
XYZ's Sunday mainstay, The Thompsons, has been running for 15 years. That's a lot of episodes and the animated series' biggest fans have seen them many times over. However, there's one episode that no one has ever seen, and it's going to finally air this week.

The episode in question, Dead Bort, is exactly what it sounds like. In the episode, the troublemaking ten-year old protagonist of the series, Bort, dies a horrible death. This episode was originally intended as a series finale if the show failed, however, with that no longer being an issue at risk, the producers have decided to finally let the episode air.

Bort dies this Sunday on XYZ! How will the family handle his death? Make sure to tune in!

<%= links['0c34d88d54050b8932aae4ac2301c847d037f645'] %>

passages.name: How Does Your Fate Align With the Moon?
passages.text:
Scholars and philosophers believe ancient peoples would predict their fates based on the phases of the moon. Considering the recent lunar eclipse, now might be the perfect time to see how your fate stacks up with those bygone customs.

(Ancient Moon chart pic)

links.label: Find your fate with the chart

passages.name: Goat Sacrifice Guide
passages.text:
CONTENT WARNING: THE FOLLOWING CONTENT FEATURES GOAT SACRIFICE

Home Scape presents a how to guide for sacrificing a goat:

Step 1: Make careful preperations for the sacrificial process. Remain calm and make sure to make the sacrifice as quick and clean as possible.

Step 2: Make sure the goat you're going to sacrifice is of the appropriate age. Some higher beings desire sacrifices of a certain age, make sure your subject is the desired age.

Step 3: Make sure your sacrifice is being done at the right time. Depending on your hemisphere, there is an appropriate time of year and day for sacrifices.

Step 4: Locate the area of the goat that would be best for sacrificing. Refer again to Step 1 and how you want to make sure your sacrifice is as quick and clean as possible.

Step 5: Make sure your sacrificial knife is appropriately sharp. If your specific sacrifice calls for a different instrument, make sure that said tool is approriately prepared.

Step 6: Despose of any excess material. Make sure all approriate arrangements have been made before hand so that your sacrifice is had in a timely matter.

Step 7: Have fun!

<%= links['1c7e9b325ebf9feca4089a61e437d572b27b92a0'] %>

passages.name: Stunning Pie Recipe
passages.text:
This pie recipe will be the delight of your friends and the bane of everyone who has ever wronged you.

1 Unbaked Pie Crust 3/4 cup sugar 1 tbsp. all-purpose flour 1 1/2 cup black crowberries 1 1/4 cup juniper berries 3/4 cup the blood of your enemies 1/2 cup fresh essence of the eternal soul 1 tbsp. lemon juice

Spread out pie crust on a floured sheet of paper to 1/4 inch thickness. Fit into a 9-inch pie plate. Refrigerate 30 minutes to 1 hour.

Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.

Whisk together sugar and flour. Stir together sugar misture, berries, blood of your enemies, fresh essence, and lemon juice. Pour into crust.

Bake at 375 degrees F for 1 hour or until lightly brown. Cover if necessary.
